    Description
    Cube
    Cube handles the game grafics with boolean data can enter zone, is there a door, is way blocked, is target zone reached and is there a target zone id's for walls n,e,s,w door texture id's d(oor) n, d(oor) e, d(oor) s, d(oor) w

    loads the grafics to buld the Gui
    and the 3D View.
